titles.title: Hold To His Hand, God's Unchanging Hand

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hold to His hand, God's unchanging hand.
Hold to His hand, God's unchanging hand.
Build your hope on things eternal.
Hold to God's unchanging hand.
